channel.title: Climate on Live Free or Dichotomize
channel.description: Recent content in Climate on Live Free or Dichotomize

item.title: The United States of Seasons
item.description: ⊕I think my favorite detail about this map is the little splotch that is the Smoky Mountains on the western edge of North Carolina. Having spent a good amount of time there they really do have a different climate than the surrounding area. The other day my girlfriend and I were talking about places we would like to live after grad school and one of the things that got brought up was how ‘seasonal’ the location is.
